name: Ocean Commander
overview: By the year 3011, a warming planet has buried our modern world beneath the waves. The nations that survived and adapted have formed the Earth Federation, and aim to bring peace and progress back tot he human experience. But the Chaos Empire seeks only world domination. As the pilot of the prototype super-sub "Metal Fin", your task is to penetrate the defenses of the Chaos Empire and defeat their leader, the evil Dr. Shark. Ocean Commander brings modern style and technology to classic side-scrolling gameplay. Enhance your ship with 12 dazzling, upgradeable weapons, then battle your way through 19 intense missions using intuitive pointing controls! Features: • 19 intense missions • 12 awesome weapons, each with mutiple upgrades • Classic side-scrolling gameplay combined with modern graphics • Intuitive pointing controls for immersive action • Campaign mode and Time Attack mode
